Protocols/ValidationDelegate.html#/s:FP1.name: validationSuccessful()
Protocols/ValidationDelegate.html#/s:FP1.abstract: This method will be called on delegate object when validation is successful.

Protocols/ValidationDelegate.html#/s:FP1.name: validationFailed(_:)
Protocols/ValidationDelegate.html#/s:FP1.abstract: This method will be called on delegate object when validation fails.

Protocols/Rule.html#/s:FP14SwiftValidato.name: errorMessage()
Protocols/Rule.html#/s:FP14SwiftValidato.abstract: Displays error message of a field that has failed validation.

Protocols/Rule.html.name: Rule
Protocols/Rule.html.abstract: The Rule protocol declares the required methods for all objects that subscribe to it.

Protocols/ValidationDelegate.html.name: ValidationDelegate
Protocols/ValidationDelegate.html.abstract: Protocol for ValidationDelegate adherents, which comes with two required methods that are called depending on whether validation succeeded or failed.

Classes/ExactLengthRule.html#/s:FC14Swif.abstract: Displays error message if a field fails validation.

Classes/MaxLengthRule.html#/s:FC14SwiftV.abstract: Displays an error message if a field fails validation.

Classes/Validator.html#/s:vC14SwiftValid.name: validations
Classes/Validator.html#/s:vC14SwiftValid.abstract: Dictionary to hold all fields (and accompanying rules) that will undergo validation.

Classes/Validator.html#/s:vC14SwiftValid.name: errors
Classes/Validator.html#/s:vC14SwiftValid.abstract: Dictionary to hold fields (and accompanying errors) that were unsuccessfully validated.

Classes/Validator.html#/s:FC14SwiftValid.name: validateField(_:callback:)
Classes/Validator.html#/s:FC14SwiftValid.abstract: This method is used to validate a single field registered to Validator. If validation is unsuccessful,

Classes/Validator.html#/s:FC14SwiftValid.name: styleTransformers(success:error:)
Classes/Validator.html#/s:FC14SwiftValid.abstract: This method is used to style fields that have undergone validation checks. Success callback should be used to show common success styling and error callback should be used to show common error styling.

Classes/Validator.html#/s:FC14SwiftValid.name: registerField(_:errorLabel:rules:)
Classes/Validator.html#/s:FC14SwiftValid.abstract: This method is used to add a field to validator.

Classes/Validator.html#/s:FC14SwiftValid.name: unregisterField(_:)
Classes/Validator.html#/s:FC14SwiftValid.abstract: This method is for removing a field validator.

Classes/Validator.html#/s:FC14SwiftValid.name: validate(_:)
Classes/Validator.html#/s:FC14SwiftValid.abstract: This method checks to see if all fields in validator are valid.

Classes/Validator.html#/s:FC14SwiftValid.name: validate(_:)
Classes/Validator.html#/s:FC14SwiftValid.abstract: This method validates all fields in validator and sets any errors to errors parameter of callback.

Classes/MaxLengthRule.html.abstract: MaxLengthRule is a subclass of Rule that defines how maximum character length is validated.
